author: Rachel Kaser
title: Uber launches new services so you can get more than food delivered
description: Uber today revealed it was launching two new services for users that essentially turn Uber's drivers into item couriers -- and in both cases, it seems the intent is to help drivers ...
content:
Uber today revealed it was launching two new services for users that essentially turn Ubers drivers into item couriers and in both cases, it seems the intent is to help drivers who are struggling thanks to the coronavirus.
With Uber Direct, drivers can now d… [+2391 chars]
